titles.title: For the relief of Abecnego Monje Ortiz, Dolores Ortiz, and Eneyda Monje Ortiz.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/24/2001--Introduced. Declares Abecnego Monje Ortiz, Dolores Ortiz, and Eneyda Monje Ortiz to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
